queries.sql: SELECT `penilaian_karyawan`.*, `karyawan`.`name`, `sk1`.`keterangan` as `k1_ket`, `sk2`.`keterangan` as `k2_ket`, `sk3`.`keterangan` as `k3_ket`, `sk4`.`keterangan` as `k4_ket`, `sk5`.`keterangan` as `k5_ket` FROM `penilaian_karyawan` JOIN `karyawan` ON `karyawan`.`id` = `penilaian_karyawan`.`karyawan_id` LEFT JOIN `sub_kriteria` as `sk1` ON `sk1`.`nilai` = `penilaian_karyawan`.`k1` AND `sk1`.`kriteria_id` = 25 LEFT JOIN `sub_kriteria` as `sk2` ON `sk2`.`nilai` = `penilaian_karyawan`.`k2` AND `sk2`.`kriteria_id` = 26 LEFT JOIN `sub_kriteria` as `sk3` ON `sk3`.`nilai` = `penilaian_karyawan`.`k3` AND `sk3`.`kriteria_id` = 27 LEFT JOIN `sub_kriteria` as `sk4` ON `sk4`.`nilai` = `penilaian_karyawan`.`k4` AND `sk4`.`kriteria_id` = 28 LEFT JOIN `sub_kriteria` as `sk5` ON `sk5`.`nilai` = `penilaian_karyawan`.`k5` AND `sk5`.`kriteria_id` = 29
